title: Coronavirus and homeworking in the UK
description: Homeworking patterns in the UK, broken down by sex, age, region and ethnicity.
datasetNotes: On the landing page click on the link a new page will open click on the link in the green box ' View all data in ths statisical bulletin' on the right of the page , a further page will open, click on the link , a further page will open and the dataset can be found  under your down load option
